xml.p: Introduction: "Well hello there! I'm Gus, chef and owner of the Stardrop Saloon.#$e#Stop in if you need any refreshments. I've always got hot coffee and cold beer at the ready.$h" #!String
accept_865: "*sniff* sniff* ... that sharp smell!#$b#*slurp* *slurp* ... that zesty taste! That gritty texture!#$b#It can only be gourmet tomato salt! I'll trade you for it." #!String
Resort_Entering: "Hey, @! Glad you're here. I'm gonna be serving up some good stuff from behind the bar." #!String
Resort_Leaving: "I'll see you back home, @." #!String
Resort: "Meet me at the bar if you need a beverage." #!String
IslandSouth_14_21: "Hey, need a drink? I've got some special beverages that showcase local ingredients from this island.$h" #!String
willyCrabs: "These might be the best crab cakes I've ever made..." #!String
Mon: "Yeah, I know a lot about the people living here.#$e#That's one of the benefits of being a bartender.$h#$e#Sometimes I hear too much..." #!String
pamHouseUpgrade: "Hey. I heard what you did for Pam. That was really really nice of you!$h#$e#Sadly, I don't think it will get her to cut back on the 'beverages'..." #!String
pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: "I saw Pam earlier today... she was grinning from ear to ear! She said someone bought her a new house!#$e#Whoever it was, they truly deserve the best!$h" #!String
Saloon: "Good evening. Can I get you anything?" #!String
Saloon4: "Good evening. Make yourself at home." #!String
SeedShop_Entry: "Hi, Pierre!/Now, what do I need.../Ah, that looks good!/Makin' my special sauce tonight!/Pierre! What's fresh?/Pierre! Waddya got for me?" #!String
Saloon8: "Hi there @. I'm glad to see you! You're always welcome here." #!String
Saloon_Tue: "Hi! Please relax and enjoy yourself." #!String
Saloon_Thu: "Hey, you look like you could use a beverage." #!String
Saloon_Fri: "Business has been really good tonight. I'm pleased." #!String

Tue: "I sell different dishes each week, so make sure and check in every now and then!#$e#You might taste something spectacular.$h#$e#Just let me know if you have any allergies.$s#$e#Okay, see you around." #!String
Wed: "Emily's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without her!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s" #!String
Thu: "Pam and Clint come into the saloon almost every night.#$e#I'd probably go out of business if they stopped coming.$h#$e#So make sure you don't drive them away!" #!String

Thu6: "Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.#$e#Sometimes he glances over at Emily with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me." #!String
Thu8: "Pam comes into the saloon almost every night and drinks way too much beer.#$e#Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgement on my customers." #!String
Fri: "Hi there, @. If you're ever thirsty, the Saloon is the place to be." #!String
Fri4: "I don't actually drink very much myself. I'm mainly doing this to make a living.#$e#Although I do enjoy a taste of the Stardew Valley vintage from time to time." #!String
Sat: "Are you much of a chef, @?#$e#If you have a kitchen and some recipes, you can cook some useful dishes.#$e#Home-cooked meals make great gifts, as well." #!String
Sun: "Business has been pretty steady thanks to my regular customers." #!String
